text: George Powers Cockcroft (November 15, 1932 â€“ November 6, 2020), widely known by the pen name Luke Rhinehart, was an American novelist, screenwriter, and nonfiction writer. He was born in Albany, New York. Rhinehart was known for his writing works The Dice Man (1971), Adventures of Wim (1986) and The Search for the Dice Man (1993). Rhinehart died on November 6, 2020 at the age of 87.The Dice Man author George Cockcroft (aka Luke Rhinehart) dies aged 87 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American novelists Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:People from Albany, New York
title: Luke Rhinehart
